summary: Implements an image-to-image generation pipeline based on latent consistency models, orchestrating encoding, diffusion, and decoding steps while integrating safety checks, adapter loading, and various fine‑tuning mechanisms.
business_intent: Provide a flexible, ready‑to‑use solution for generating new images from existing ones using latent consistency diffusion, supporting customization through adapters, LoRA, and textual inversion, and ensuring safe outputs for downstream applications.
